name: Rodent Warriors
description:
Rodent Warriors is a 2D action RPG / idle / indie / retro game that we know people are going to love to play. Well some people at least...

Choose from 6 hero classes. Each hero has a unique back story and set of weaknesses. When one hero dies a new, more powerful hero, will take their place.


Complete quests to uncover the story of the 'Chosen One'.


Defeat enemies in good old classic 2D rpg action.


Craft and equip items. The more items you craft, the stronger they become. Craft epic and legendary items, each with their own powers and unique back story.


Each class has unique skills.


Level up!
